info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rock Island and northwestern Henry Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Silvis, or over East Moline, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moline, East Moline, Silvis, Colona, Coal Valley, Cleveland, Warner, Dayton, Carbon Cliff, Silvis Heights, Barstow, Green River, and Rock Island County Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 4 and 10. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 8 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
